DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine mutation rate HRAS PIK3CA patient head neck squamous cell carcinoma ( HNSCC ) treat cisplatin/placebo cisplatin/cetuximab protocol ECOG-E5397 . - To determine association HRAS PIK3CA mutation status clinical benefit ( i.e. , response , progression-free survival , overall survival ) patient treat cisplatin/cetuximab compare receive cisplatin/placebo protocol ECOG-E5397 . OUTLINE : DNA isolate one unstained slide per patient . The mutation HRAS PIK3CA determine use BEAMING technology .
